MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALGetSourcei Buffer = int32(4105)

Docs.summary: Indicate the Buffer to provide sound samples. Type: uint Range: any valid Buffer Handle.

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALGetSourcei BuffersProcessed = int32(4118)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALGetSourcei BuffersQueued = int32(4117)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALGetSourcei ByteOffset = int32(4134)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALGetSourcei SampleOffset = int32(4133)

MemberSignature.Value: .field public static literal valuetype OpenTK.Audio.OpenAL.ALGetSourcei SourceState = int32(4112)

Docs.summary: The state of the source (Stopped, Playing, etc.) Use the enum AlSourceState for comparison.
